<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// corresponding MASS (scalar) entries for PowerPC targets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Following are examples of such conversion:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     tanh ---&gt; &#95;&#95;xl&#95;tanh&#95;finite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Such lowering is legal under the fast-math option.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
